channel.title: getassociatedparent on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in getassociatedparent on SoftLayer API

item.title: Find provisioned product from a billing item
item.description: Operation: GET Method: SoftLayer_Billing_Item::getAssociatedParent() URL: SoftLayer_Billing_Item/getAssociatedParent Example CURL: curl -su userid:api_key https://api.softlayer.com/rest/v3/SoftLayer_Billing_Item/<billing_item_id>/getAssociatedParent?objectMask=mask\[categoryCode,id,description\] Example Response: [ { "categoryCode": "storage_service_enterprise", "description": "Endurance Storage", "id": 1234321 } ]
